artifacts.title: Class 65-9WA Commemorative Lighter
artifacts.description: Presentation lighter commemorating WOC Arthur P. Lancy Jr., member of the first graduating class using the Hughes TH-55A helicopter at Fort Wolters Primary Helicopter Training School, 1965.
artifacts.provenance: Presented to WOC Arthur P. Lancy Jr., Class 65-9WA, first graduating class to use the Hughes TH-55A helicopter at Fort Wolters, Texas

metadata.markings: Class 65-9WA, Hughes World Leader logo, presentation inscription
metadata.historical_significance: First graduating class to use the Hughes TH-55A helicopter
